headline: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) Secures 20-Year License Renewal for Oconee Nuclear Station
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) recently secured a 20-year renewal from the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission for its Oconee Nuclear Station, allowing continued operations and reinforcing its clean energy strategy. This regulatory success, alongside a strategic increase in its credit facility and robust earnings results for Q4 2024, aligns with Duke Energy's focus on sustainable growth. During the same quarter, market volatility was fueled by uncertainty over impending tariffs, but Duke's 13% share...

headline: Harry Sideris steps into CEO role leading Duke Energy, joins Board of Directors
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE: DUK) today announced Harry Sideris has assumed the role of chief executive officer and has joined the company's board of directors. His appointment was part of a planned transition announced earlier this year.

headline: Duke Energy Hits 52-Week High: What's Driving the Stock?
summary: DUK hits a new 52-week high owing to the company's consistent strong performance and approval from the NRC to extend its largest nuclear plant's operations.
